That's biometric authentication.
Now recently or will in the several recent years many people have tried to make these biometric authentication systems more rubbished by using more than one modality.
So you could use instead of only using said the face of the person to decide whether this person is who he claims to be.
You could use the face and the voice or the face, the voice and the iris, and using these combined system you get more robust performance, because if one modality.
Fails, you can expect that the other ones may be better.
